group_1.textLeft: You want me to make a [textBlue:Rumor] for you?@Whatever for?

group_1.textRight: Yes. I was thinking about what we talked@about yesterday...
I don't think Yachan will join the Wings of@the Magius.
Actually, I believe she will side against us@once she learns of our existence.

group_1.textLeft: Even if you tried to convince her?

group_1.textRight: I don't think I could change that.
So I'd like you to craft a [textBlue:Rumor] that can@stop her.

group_1.textLeft: I understand how you feel, Mifuyu.
I would like to avoid confronting a veteran@like her if possible, myself.
It comes at a cost. I consume my own@life force.
My general aim is to only use it for those@stories I weave for myself.

group_1.textRight: I don't want to tell you what the Rumor @should be about.

group_1.textLeft: So you just want to suggest a theme?
Hm. Well, you've piqued my interest.@I may as well hear what you have to say.

group_1.textRight: What I'd like for you to make...
Is something that will keep her from showing@up until our plans are complete.

group_1.textLeft: I see. That could be interesting...
Yes, I will. It sounds like an intriguing@challenge.
